alert.note: Alert for Buchanan; Delaware; Dubuque (Iowa) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS QuadCities (Eastern Iowa and Northwestern Illinois - Quad Cities)
info.headline: Dense Fog Advisory issued August 03 at 3:38AM CDT until August 03 at 9:00AM CDT by NWS QuadCities
info.description: ...DENSE FOG ADVISORY REMAINS IN EFFECT UNTIL 9 AM CDT THIS MORNING... * WHAT...Visibility one quarter mile or less in dense fog. * WHERE...In Iowa, Buchanan, Delaware and Dubuque Counties. In Illinois, Jo Daviess and Stephenson Counties. * WHEN...From 3 AM to 9 AM CDT Thursday. * IMPACTS...Hazardous driving conditions due to low visibility. * ADDITIONAL DETAILS...If traveling early this morning please be prepared for sudden reductions in visibility in areas of fog. Please slow down and keep extra distance between you and other cars. Also, use low beam headlights while traveling.
info.instruction: If driving, slow down, use your headlights, and leave plenty of distance ahead of you.
